title: Kali: Destroyer of Worlds
description: A gamma ray burst starts civilization crumbling, and a suicidal little girl must embrace her inner darkness to survive. Through death and fire, Rebecca Wilder has been reborn. Will her destructive revenge take the world with it, or can a twelve-year old girl salvage her humanity and stop nuclear annihilation? Kali - Destroyer of Worlds follows Beckyâ€™s journey as she confronts the horrors that are left behind after the world ends.
author: Mike Kuykendall
